title: can u give me a better explaination about why i am banned?
body:
ï»¿Greetings juanjuanjuan1114,

Actions that have been performed on your account are in violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use. You can review these terms at http://www.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Due to the severity of this violation, your League of Legends account has been banned until Tue Sep 27 09:58:27 UTC 2016

If you have any questions, contact our Player Support team at https://support.leagueoflegends.com/home

Riot Games Player Support


so after such an email was sent i am banned

with out good explanation? so which part i violated?
havnt p afk for 2 days? never say 1 word in game chat? and i never intentional feeding

so why am i banned? does ur riot fking staff members never thought properly respond to custermers? when i reach out to ur support team u just log me out, so fking can u ban any one with out a good explanation and just write a short letter to them?

replies.body: so if any one here can help me reach riot staff members and get me  a good answer i appreciate that, but i still should say riot staff members mom dead

We are in a similar situation. My partner is permanently banned, he has been playing since early seasons and does not cheat (I play with him regularly). Riot will only tell us he has 'exploited' the game but won't give us any explanation as to what that means

Hey there,

You'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) to Player Support to receive further details about your ban.

If you're experiencing issues signing in to the support page I recommend trying either of the following.

* Use a different browser.
* Open an incognito page in your current browser and attempt to login there.
i tried out but it doesnt work. so can u help me ask the question?

What sort of problem are you running into? Do you have any error messages that can help us help you? If you're simply unable to access the support portal, try sending an email to support@riotgames.com. This may take a bit longer than submitting a ticket, but should allow Riot Support to communicate with you. Keep me updated!
